title: 2021-09-17 - 2021-09-17 - SQUIRRELWAFFLE Loader with Cobalt Strike
plain_text:
# 2021-09-17 (FRIDAY) - SQUIRRELWAFFLE LOADER WITH COBALT STRIKE

See [2021-09-17-IOCs-for-Squirrelwaffle-loader-with-Cobalt-Strike.txt.zip for more info](https://www.malware-traffic-analysis.net/2021/09/17/2021-09-17-IOCs-for-Squirrelwaffle-loader-with-Cobalt-Strike.txt.zip)

All zip archives on this site are password-protected. If you don't know the password,
see the "about" page of this website.
